When running on Windows with custom SSL.start: set HTTPS=true&&set SSL_CRT_FILE=[path to cert.crt]&&set SSL_KEY_FILE=[path to cert.key]&&node ./server/index.js
When running on Windows with custom SSL.client: set HTTPS=true&&set SSL_CRT_FILE=[path to cert.crt]&&set SSL_KEY_FILE=[path to cert.key]&&npm run start --prefix client

When running on Linux/MacOS with custom.start: HTTPS=true SSL_CRT_FILE=[path to cert.crt] SSL_KEY_FILE=[path to cert.key] node ./server/index.js
When running on Linux/MacOS with custom.client: HTTPS=true SSL_CRT_FILE=[path to cert.crt] SSL_KEY_FILE=[path to cert.key] npm run start --prefix client
